title.narrative: OUTPUT 1: COMMUNITY ACTION FOR TOTAL SANITATION

description.narrative: Community Action for Total Sanitation triggered to achieve Open Defecation Free status for villages in target districts, which contributes to Hygiene, Sanitation. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Improved and equitable use of safe drinking water, sanitation, with improved hygiene practices and healthy environments.
